questions.question: So as part of Empatica, you have sensors, so what kind of sensors do you use?
What's your hope of how we can make the world a better place with this wearable tech?
Why can't we be thinking more about things that do more with less for these books?
It's easy to fool people, but does it actually have conscious experience like we do?
So is it just 42 or is there, do you have other words that you can put around it?
